title: Unilever Deploys Autonomous AI Agents Across 400+ Brand Marketing Campaigns
summary: Unilever reveals its AI agent network now manages creative testing, media allocation, and performance optimization across its full brand portfolio, reducing campaign launch times by 65%.

title: DTC Brands Shift Back to Wholesale as Digital CAC Makes Online-Only Unsustainable
summary: A growing wave of DTC brands are pursuing wholesale partnerships and physical retail as rising digital advertising costs erode the economics of the direct-to-consumer model.

title: P&G's Chief Brand Officer on Why AI Won't Replace the Big Idea
summary: In a keynote speech, P&G's Marc Pritchard argues that while AI accelerates execution, the creative spark behind iconic brand campaigns remains uniquely human and more important than ever.

title: Coca-Cola's AI Content Factory Produces 10,000 Localized Assets Per Month
summary: Coca-Cola's partnership with Bain and OpenAI scales to industrial levels, with AI generating thousands of market-specific creative assets while maintaining brand consistency across 200+ countries.

title: FMCG Brands Invest in Zero-Party Data Through Gamified Consumer Experiences
summary: CPG giants turn to interactive quizzes, reward apps, and AR product experiences to collect zero-party data directly from consumers, building rich preference profiles without relying on third-party data.

title: Nestlé and L'Oréal Pioneer AI-Driven Sustainability Messaging in Consumer Campaigns
summary: Major CPG brands use AI to craft and test sustainability-focused marketing messages, finding that AI-optimized environmental claims drive 18% more purchase intent than generic green messaging.
